promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic legendary lizard fighting-type pokemon holding a brown and grey bow. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bowdrakon, a a gigantic legendary lizard fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Overspin, Shell Hunting. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "fighting" or "Bowdrakon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, lizard-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: In ancient coliseum ruins, the colossal Bowdrakon reigns supreme. Using Overspin, it whirls opponents off balance, while Shell Hunting forges armor.
